forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy with rain developing this afternoon. High 7C. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 46F. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
